image.title: World News, Today World News, Latest International News, World Breaking News, Trending News of World - Times of India

item.title: Joe Biden 'cognitive decline' case: Jill Biden's top aide backs out of interview with probe panel
item.description: Anthony Bernal, a top aide to Jill Biden, has withdrawn from his House Oversight Committee interview concerning Joe Biden's alleged cognitive decline. Chairman James Comer condemned Bernal's action, accusing him of obstruction and a cover-up after the White House waived executive privilege. Comer plans to subpoena Bernal.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump vs the Bench: Why is Trump administration suing Maryland federal judges?
item.description: The Trump administration sued Maryland's entire federal court bench over a standing order pausing deportations, sparking debate about judicial overreach. The Justice Department argues the order defies Supreme Court precedent and obstructs the President's agenda. Legal experts criticize the move as an unprecedented attack on the courts, raising concerns about judicial independence and the separation of powers.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Witch-hunt': Trump demands end to Netanyahu's corruption trial
item.description: Donald Trump has called for the cancellation of Benjamin Netanyahu's corruption trial, praising the former Israeli Prime Minister's wartime leadership against Iran. Trump, in a Truth Social post, condemned Israel's "witch-hunt" against Netanyahu, citing their collaboration in eliminating a significant nuclear threat. Netanyahu faces charges of accepting luxury goods and attempting to manipulate media coverage, allegations he denies.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: ‘100% communist lunatic’: Trump slams Indian-American Zohran Mamdani after NYC primary win; mocks Democrats
item.description: Donald Trump criticized Zohran Mamdani, labeling him a "100% Communist Lunatic" after his apparent mayoral primary win against Andrew Cuomo. Trump's post on Truth Social also targeted Chuck Schumer with false claims. Republicans are attempting to portray Mamdani as representative of the Democratic party, while some conservatives are attacking his faith.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Indian-origin Zohran Mamdani to be next NYC mayor: Old post on 'Queer Liberation' goes viral; Vivek Ramaswamy suggests 'move to Ohio'
item.description: Zohran Kwame Mamdani's recent New York City mayoral primary win sparked social media reactions. Railey Gaines criticized Mamdani's past support for defunding the police, tweeting disapproval of New York City's future. Vivek Ramaswamy responded by suggesting Gaines relocate to Ohio, touting its economic benefits and family-friendly environment. Mamdani, the son of Indian immigrants, won the Democratic primary.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: ‘Propaganda media’: Tulsi Gabbard slams media over reports undermining Iran strike; CIA confirms severe damage
item.description: Top US intelligence officials strongly refuted media reports downplaying the impact of recent airstrikes on Iran's nuclear sites. Director od national inteligence Tulsi Gabbard asserted the 'complete destruction' of facilities at Natanz, Fordow, and Isfahan, estimating years for reconstruction. CIA director John Ratcliffe confirmed 'credible intelligence' indicating serious setbacks to Iran's nuclear program.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Operation Midnight Hammer: US state secy Marco Rubio denies limited damage reports; says Iran now 'much further away from nukes'
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio stated that Iran's nuclear weapons program is significantly set back following recent US airstrikes, contradicting reports suggesting minimal impact. While President Trump hinted at regime change, Rubio clarified the US aims to prevent Iran from acquiring nuclear weapons, viewing regime change as a potential consequence of Iran's current trajectory.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: China bridge collapse: Truck hangs mid-air with driver inside - watch terrifying video
item.description: A cargo truck in China's Guizhou province precariously dangled from a collapsed highway bridge after a landslide triggered by torrential rains. The incident, captured on video and shared by Reuters, shows the truck's cabin hanging mid-air. Driver You Guochun recounted the terrifying moment, stating the bridge vanished before him. Emergency services swiftly rescued the driver, with no injuries reported.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 2026 senate race: Scott Brown launches bid to flip battleground New Hampshire seat from blue to red; Pappas criticizes
item.description: Scott Brown, former ambassador and senator, has announced his candidacy for the New Hampshire Senate seat in 2026, aiming to unseat Democratic senator Jeanne Shaheen. Brown, emphasizing border security and New Hampshire values, criticizes Biden's policies and Pappas' support.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Daddy used strong words': Rutte jokes at Nato meet; Trump likens Iran-Israel clash to schoolyard fight
item.description: During a NATO summit, Mark Rutte jokingly called Donald Trump "daddy" after Trump likened the Iran-Israel conflict to a schoolyard fight. This exchange followed a US airstrike, Operation Midnight Hammer, which targeted Iranian nuclear facilities. The operation involved numerous aircraft and precision-guided weapons, including bunker-buster bombs, aimed at crippling Iran's uranium enrichment program.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: From rent freeze to Israel: What are Zohran Mamdani’s views on major issues? Find out more about NYC's Democratic Mayoral nominee
item.description: From rent controls and universal childcare to his controversial views on Israel–Palestine, Mamdani’s platform represents a radical departure from City Hall’s traditional centrism. Here's a breakdown of his core beliefs and proposals.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Under Trump’s pressure, Nato commits to 5% defense spending by 2035; restates 'ironclad commitment' to collective defense
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did a bald JD Vance meme really get this tourist banned from America? Here’s what really happened
item.description: A Norwegian tourist, Mads Mikkelsen, was recently denied entry into the US, sparking controversy. Initially, it was alleged a JD Vance meme on his phone was the cause. However, US Customs clarified the denial stemmed from Mikkelsen's admitted past drug use. Mikkelsen alleges mistreatment, including strip-searches and falsified records.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Why Germany's former chancellor has triggered fresh outrage
After US bombs Iran, North Korea watches closely
Zohran Mamdani’s biggest victory? From pestering Mira Nair to cast Kal Penn to winning NYC’s mayoral primary
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: ECOWAS gets a new leader at pivotal time for West Africa
500% tariff on Russia? Will Trump tighten economic screws on Kremlin - Here's what Marco Rubio said
item.description: Donald Trump's administration might not increase sanctions on Russia. Secretary of State Marco Rubio wants room for peace talks. He fears more sanctions could halt negotiations with Russia regarding Ukraine. The US hasn't lifted existing sanctions. The White House is working on tariffs for countries importing Russian energy. Russia aims to gain territory through military action. The US believes this will be difficult for Russia to achieve.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Syria: IS splinter group behind church bombing
Iran-Israel conflict: Trump recaps 24 hours timeline - From Tehran attack on US airbase to ceasefire violation
item.description: Tensions flared as Iran struck a US base in Qatar, prompting a swift response from President Trump, who downplayed the attack and announced a ceasefire. Despite the declared agreement, fighting continued overnight, leading to Trump's public frustration with both Israel and Iran. By Tuesday afternoon, a fragile calm emerged, with both sides seemingly observing the ceasefire after Trump's diplomatic intervention.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
